version_name: History and What's New: Added to Settings to help you stay up to date on all the changes we are makingPlease send us feedback through the app
History and What's New: Added to Settings to help you stay up to date on all the changes we are makingPlease send us feedback through the app

version_description: [+] DAU is now available in Usage Intelligence while visiting an app's usage history
[+] DAU is now available in Usage Intelligence while visiting an app's usage history

[+] DAU is now available in Usage Intelligence while visiting an app's usage history
[+] Bug fix

[+] DAU is now available in Usage Intelligence while visiting an app's usage history
[+] Bug fix
[+] Added country flag indicators to show where an app company is headquartered
[+] Added country flag indicators to show where an app company is headquartered
[+] Change rates added to Top Apps by Downloads and Revenue, Top Publishers by Downloads and Revenue, and Top Apps by Usage
[+] Change rates added to Top Apps by Downloads and Revenue, Top Publishers by Downloads and Revenue, and Top Apps by Usage

[+] New navigation of single app level: we have introduced a Tab Bar for navigation between reports.
[+] Common date ranges (i.e. 7 days, 30 days, 90 days, 1 year, all time) have been added directly to Rank History, Analytics Summary and Intelligence Summary pages.
[+] On Rank History, compare up to 4 countries while viewing an app to see how this app ranks over time across different markets.
[+] Introducing data breakdown filters on Rank History and Analytics Dashboard. This shows a breakdown of a specific metrics across countries (i.e. Total downloads = 100; China = 50, United States = 30, France = 20).
[+] Market Intelligence data is now all in one view - access downloads, revenue and usage metrics in the same view.
[+] App screenshots now available on app details page.
[+] Ratings has a summary of current app rating and/or overall app rating for an overview before going into the breakdown by country.

[+] Added more metrics and data breakdowns to Analytics Summary page: Sales Revenue, IAP Revenue, Ad Revenue, Ad Expense, Gross Margin, DAD, 30 Day Active, Store Views.
[+] Added more metrics and data breakdowns to Analytics Summary page: Sales Revenue, IAP Revenue, Ad Revenue, Ad Expense, Gross Margin, DAD, 30 Day Active, Store Views.

[+] 24 hour rank history on details tab
[+] Summary view added to the details tab - now you are able to see current rank, ratings and recent reviews in one view.

We will continue to add more data and insights to this new summary page overtime, i.e. featured info, market data, etc. We want to hear from you - let us know what you would like to see added. In the app, go to Menu > Settings > Feedback > write us a message! Thanks for using App Annie.

[+] 24 hour rank history on details tab
[+] Summary view added to the details tab - now you are able to see current rank, ratings and recent reviews in one view.

We will continue to add more data and insights to this new summary page overtime, i.e. featured info, market data, etc. We want to hear from you - let us know what you would like to see added. In the app, go to Menu > Settings > Feedback > write us a message! Thanks for using App Annie.

Keep current with key app market events and insights through App Annie articles, blogs and reports, now available from your phone.

[+] Added App Annie Insights
[+] Bookmark a favorite report, blog or article
[+] Search by keyword or filter by topic to find specific Insights
[+] Share with others

• 创建自己的主界面，在几秒钟内即可获取所有您喜欢的指标
• 您可以根据需要添加多个窗口小组件，它们可以为您提供重要的概览信息
• 新的博客窗口小组件将帮助您随时了解最新的移动市场新闻和趋势
